headline: KeyBanc Reaffirms Overweight on Constellation (CEG), Eyes Year-End Deal
summary: Constellation Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:CEG) is one of the 10 AI Stocks Making Waves on Wall Street. On August 8, KeyBanc analyst Sophie Karp raised the price target on the stock to $359.00 (from $337.00) while maintaining an Overweight rating. The firm noted how Constellation reported its second-quarter results slightly ahead of consensus expectations, reiterating both its 2025 […]

headline: Nuclear Stocks Shine as Demand for Zero-Carbon Energy Accelerates
summary: Investors looking to build a nuclear-focused portfolio may find strong opportunities in companies such as NextEra Energy, Duke Energy and Constellation Energy.
